title: Kafanchan
synopsis: Kafanchan is a town in southern Kaduna State in north-central Nigeria. It is the location of a junction station of the Nigerian Railway Corporation, and it sits on the line connecting Port Harcourt, Enugu, Kafanchan, Kuru, Bauchi, and finally Maiduguri. As of 2007 Kafanchan had an estimated population of 83,092 - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kafanchan wikipedia]

title: Liquid Democracy
synopsis: Liquid Democracy is a combination of [[Direct Democracy]], and [[Representative Democracy]]. It aims to create a more flexible and fluid way for people to express their [[Democratic Preference]].

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.
